If you cannot pay or get an error using Tap N' Pay, please ensure your device supports NFC. To check if your phone is NFC capable, look at your phone’s settings and look for any mention of NFC.

Please also check with the merchant if their POS terminal is **NFC enabled.**

![Screenshot 2024-11-22 at 10.52.49 AM.png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/40300569661977)

If your device is capable of using NFC, please make sure to [activate your GCash Tap N' Pay](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/34932356672537-GCash-Tap-to-Pay).
